summary: Offers a high‑level wrapper that loads a LightGlue model in ONNX format, selects the appropriate execution device, and runs descriptor‑based keypoint matching inference through ONNX Runtime, exposing a callable interface for easy integration.
business_intent: Enable developers to incorporate fast, accurate keypoint matching into computer‑vision applications such as SLAM, image retrieval, and augmented reality without needing a full deep‑learning stack.
